snippet: There’s the farsighted Mayor Bloomberg hailed for his vision and then there’s the tone-deaf Mayor Bloomberg who doesn’t understand the working class.
abstract: Editorial explores two sides of New York City Mayor Michael Bloomberg, noting that his farsighted leadership is undercut by pro-business policies and his oblivious commentary on class and race.
lead_paragraph: There’s the farsighted Mayor Bloomberg hailed for his vision and then there’s the tone-deaf Mayor Bloomberg who doesn’t understand the working class.
